Body.Desc1:
Regularly, a standard cleaning is carried out at least 3 times a year: in Autumn, Spring (Hrobky), and anniversary.
Polishing of the stele using special agents, depending on the stone, is carried out once every 3-5 years.
Cleaning the grave with this frequency will keep the place in good condition and preserve the decent appearance of the granite monument for decades.
Body.Desc2: Our employees personally travel to any cemeteries in Kyiv and the Oblast to carry out work. Also, our office can take professional photos of the burial place and fulfill your personal orders (ones not included in the list above).
Body.Desc3: Almost any work is included in the complex of grave care services at the cemetery in Kyiv. The company will take constant control over the burial site and the surrounding area. Prices for cleaning graves may vary depending on the amount of performed work, but each client is guaranteed to receive an individual approach.

list1.l0: We will landscape the graves, plant flowers and shrubs, cut grass, collect withered plants, do a watering;
list1.l1: We’ll take care of the area around the grave, sprinkle gravel, sand, marble and granite pebbles;
list1.l2: We will clean the grave from snow, leaves, branches, and trash;
list1.l3: We’ll wash the tombstone, monument, crypt; paint a metal fence/cross;
list1.l4: We can place bouquets or baskets of fresh flowers (dried flowers in winter) and wreaths on the date specified by you;

list2.l0: Constant care of the grave (according to the client's schedule);
list2.l2: Grave cleaning on a certain date (as agreed with the client);
list2.l3: Service subscription (yearly care of the grave).

list2.descr: With "Memoria" it is easy to order general cleaning, landscaping, or any other grave care service.
list2.l0: Leave a request directly on the website or contact us by phone.
list2.l1: Tell us exactly what services you are interested in: whether it is cleaning, planting flowers, care, or some other specialized service.
list2.l2: We calculate how much the specified set of works costs. The price depends on the area of the burial site, the type and amount of work.
list2.l3: We start performing work after an advance payment of 30% of the cost of the service ordered.
list2.l4: We find the grave according to the customer's instructions or geodata.
list2.l5: Before starting the work and after its completion, our experts take photos of the grave so that you can see the result.
list2.l6: All services include the cost of our materials;
list2.l7: We provide a one-year warranty for all work performed.
